invalid_plugin_name.message: [%s] Invalid plugin name. The name must be comprised only of lowercased letters, numbers, hyphens and underscores.

invalid_privileged_property.message: [%s] Invalid "privileged" property: expected a boolean, got a %s.

invalid_user_object.message: You must provide a valid User object when adding context with as().

callback_argument_expected.message: Invalid argument: Expected callback to be a function, received "%s".

missing_request_object.message: Invalid argument: a Request object must be supplied.

invalid_custom_event_name.message: Custom event invalid name (%s). Colons are not allowed in custom events.

missing_request_data_or_object.message: A Request object and/or request data must be provided.

invalid_strategy_registration.message: [%s] Strategy %s: dynamic strategy registration can only be done using an "authenticator" option (see https://tinyurl.com/y7boozbk).

strategy_description_type.message: %s expected the strategy description to be an object, got: %s.

methods_property_type.message: %s expected a "methods" property of type "object", got: %s.

methodname_property_type.message: %s expected a "%s" property of type "string", got: %s.

invalid_strategy_method.message: %s the strategy method "%s" must point to an exposed function.

invalid_property_type.message: %s expected the "%s" property to be of type "string", got: %s.

missing_config_property.message: %s expected a "config" property of type "object", got: %s.

cannot_set_ctor_and_authenticator.message: %s the "authenticator" and "constructor" parameters cannot both be set.

authenticator_property_type.message: %s expected an "authenticator" property of type "string", got: %s.

expected_object_type.message: %s expected the "%s" property to be of type "object", got: %s.

invalid_fields_property_type.message: %s expected the "fields" property to be of type "array", got: %s.

incorrect_controller_description_type.message: %s Incorrect controller description type (expected object, got: "%s").

strategies_plugin_property_empty.message: %s the exposed "strategies" plugin property must be a non-empty object.

authenticators_plugin_property_not_an_ob.message: %s the exposed "authenticators" plugin property must be of type "object".

http_verb_not_allowed.message: %s Only following http verbs are allowed: "%s". %s

invalid_name_property.message: [%s/manifest.json] Invalid "name" property: expected a non-empty string.

function_validate_not_implemented.message: The type %s must implement the function 'validate'.

function_validateFieldSpecification_not_.message: The type %s must implement the function 'validateFieldSpecification'.

function_getStrictness_not_implemented.message: The allowing children type %s must implement the function 'getStrictness'.

version_mismatch.message: [%s/manifest.json] Version mismatch: current Kuzzle version %s does not match the manifest requirements (%s).

cannot_use_realtime_method.message: "realtime:%s" method is not available in plugins. You should use plugin hooks instead.

plugin_initialization_failed.message: Something went wrong during initialization of "%s" plugin.

plugin_threw_non_kuzzle_error.message: Plugin %s pipe for event '%s' threw a non-Kuzzle error: %s.

verify_dont_return_promise.message: %s expected the "verify" to return a Promise, got: %s.

invalid_authentication_kuid.message: %s invalid authentication kuid returned: expected a string, got a %s.

unknown_kuzzle_user_identifier.message: %s returned an unknown Kuzzle user identifier.

cannot_remove_others_plugin_strategy.message: Cannot remove strategy %s: owned by another plugin.

cannot_remove_unexistant_strategy.message: Cannot remove strategy %s: strategy does not exist.

unable_to_load_plugin_from_directory.message: Unable to load plugins from directory "%s"; %s.

unable_to_load_plugin_from_path.message: Unable to load plugin from path "%s"; %s.

privileged_mode_not_supported.message: The plugin "%s" is configured to run in privileged mode, but it does not seem to support it.

privileged_mode_not_setted.message: The plugin "%s" needs to run in privileged mode to work, you have to explicitly set "privileged: true" in its configuration.

unable_to_serialize_response.message: Unable to serialize response. Are you trying to return the request?

user_creation.message:
An error occurred during the creation of user "%s":
%s

unexpected_return_value.message: Unexpected return value from action "%s:%s": expected a Promise

unable_to_remove_connection_invalid_args.message: Unable to remove connection - invalid arguments: %s

unable_to_remove_connection_unknown_conn.message: Unable to remove connection - unknown connection identifier: %s
